services.title: Swedish Massage
services.shortDescription: Flowing strokes for deep relaxation and stress relief.
services.description: Long, flowing strokes release tension from head to toe. Customized pressure and technique tailored to your preferences.
services.idealFor: Anyone seeking relaxation and stress relief

services.title: Deep Tissue Massage
services.shortDescription: Targeted therapy for chronic tension and muscle recovery.
services.description: Targeted relief for chronic tension and muscle recovery. Advanced techniques reach deep muscle layers, releasing persistent stress.
services.idealFor: Those with chronic tension or muscle pain

services.title: Reflexology
services.shortDescription: Pressure point therapy targeting feet for whole-body wellness.
services.description: Specialized pressure point therapy focused on the feet. Based on the principle that specific points correspond to different body systems.
services.idealFor: Those seeking holistic healing and relaxation

services.title: Lymphatic Drainage Massage
services.shortDescription: Gentle technique to support the body's natural detox.
services.description: Gentle, rhythmic massage technique designed to stimulate the lymphatic system and support the body's natural detoxification process.
services.idealFor: Those with swelling, post-surgery, or seeking detox

services.title: Post-Surgical Massage
services.shortDescription: Specialized recovery support for post-operative healing.
services.description: Specialized therapeutic massage designed to support healing after surgical procedures. Gentle techniques reduce scar tissue and improve recovery.

services.title: Couples Massage
services.shortDescription: Share a relaxing experience with someone special.
services.description: Share a relaxing experience with your partner. Consecutive sessions create the perfect setting for connection and relaxation together.

services.title: Prenatal Massage
services.shortDescription: Safe, nurturing care for expectant mothers.
services.description: Specially designed for expectant mothers. Safe, nurturing techniques ease pregnancy-related discomfort with proper positioning.

addOns.title: Hot Stones
addOns.description: Heated basalt stones for deeper relaxation

addOns.title: Aromatherapy
addOns.description: Essential oil blends tailored to your needs
